column14:
Guidelines on the management and referrals of suspected and confirmed COVID-19 Cases under Code Red: 
-All municipal and city health offices are directed to triage and manage all patients suspected to have COVID 19
-They must coordinate with brgy. Emergency Health Response Teams for monitoring those in home quarantine
-ALL Level 2 and 3 hospitals must ATTEND TO ALL PATIENTS suspected to have COVID 19 and those confirmed but with mild symptoms
-ALL Level 2 and 3 hospitals are encouraged to designate a triage  area in ER for screening purposes
-ALL Level 2 and 3 hospitals are NOT TO REFUSE patients suspected or diagnosed with COVID 19. 
-Only CONFIRMED COVID 19 PATIENTS that are SEVERE AND CRITICAL shall ber eferred to RITM, San Lazaro, and Luncg Center
